lastZInstall ..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\target1.byChrom\chr1.fa[unmask] ..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\query1.byChrom\query1.fa --output=..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\target1.query1\query1\chr1.query1.axt --action:target=multiple --format=axt M=50 K=2200
lastZInstall ..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\target1.byChrom\chr2.fa[unmask] ..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\query1.byChrom\query1.fa --output=..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\target1.query1\query1\chr2.query1.axt --action:target=multiple --format=axt M=50 K=2200
lastZInstall ..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\target1.byChrom\chr1.fa[unmask] ..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\query2.byChrom\query2.fa --output=..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\target1.query2\query2\chr1.query2.axt --action:target=multiple --format=axt M=50 K=2200
lastZInstall ..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\target1.byChrom\chr2.fa[unmask] ..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\query2.byChrom\query2.fa --output=..\..\lastZWriter\testdata\target1.query2\query2\chr2.query2.axt --action:target=multiple --format=axt M=50 K=2200
